title: GET_PED_FACE_FEATURE
content:
0xBA352ADD// GetPedFaceFeature
float GET_PED_FACE_FEATURE(Ped ped, int index);Parameters:ped: The target pedindex: Face feature indexReturns: Returns ped's face feature value, or 0.0 if fails to get.A getter for _SET_PED_FACE_FEATURE. Returns 0.0 if fails to get.Examples:Lualocal noseWidth = GetPedFaceFeature(PlayerPedId(), 0)
if noseWidth == 1.0 then
  print("You have big nose!")
end
codeBlocks:
// GetPedFaceFeature
float GET_PED_FACE_FEATURE(Ped ped, int index);

local noseWidth = GetPedFaceFeature(PlayerPedId(), 0)
if noseWidth == 1.0 then
  print("You have big nose!")
end
